incidents.title: CISA Alert: Active Exploitation of Critical Infrastructure Vulnerabilities
incidents.description: CISA warns of active exploitation targeting critical infrastructure sectors. Immediate patching recommended.

incidents.title: CVE-2026-0001: Critical Remote Code Execution Vulnerability in Enterprise Software
incidents.description: A critical RCE vulnerability discovered in widely-deployed enterprise software. Exploitation observed in the wild.

incidents.title: TrickBot Variant Targeting Financial Institutions
incidents.description: New TrickBot malware variant observed targeting banking customers across multiple countries.

incidents.title: Ransomware Campaign Leveraging ProxyShell Exploits
incidents.description: Active ransomware campaign exploiting ProxyShell vulnerabilities in Exchange servers.

incidents.title: CVE-2026-0002: SQL Injection Vulnerability in Popular CMS Platform
incidents.description: SQL injection vulnerability affects thousands of websites. Patch available.

incidents.title: Major Social Media Platform Reports Unauthorized Access to User Database
incidents.description: A major social media platform confirmed unauthorized access affecting millions of users. Account credentials and personal information potentially compromised.

incidents.title: Cloud Storage Provider Discloses Security Incident
incidents.description: Popular cloud storage service reports security incident. Investigation ongoing regarding potential data exposure.
